content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Make sure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert it into an entity
### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
-  Ensure the entities are close enough to be connected by a pipe before attempting to connect them
-  Make sure the pipe connection points are not occupied by other entities or pipes
### Errors when using burner entities
-  Refuel burner entities regularly to prevent them from running out of fuel
-  Ensure burner entities have the necessary resources to function before attempting to use them
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile where you want to place an entity is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place it
